choose.when: SELECT * FROM kdt_cust_info_basc WHERE cust_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ON (pic_sn_vl) pic_sn_vl, pic_nm, tkcg_dept_nm, pic_role, pic_telno FROM kdt_cust_info_basc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kdt_cust_info_basc(cust_nm, pridtf_no, eml_addr, home_telno, mbl_telno, cr_nm, road_nm_addr, frst_reg_dt) VALUES(#{cust_nm}, #{pridtf_no}, #{eml_addr}, #{home_telno}, #{mbl_telno}, #{cr_nm}, #{road_nm_addr}, #{frst_reg_dt})
